name: Non-Inverse Antimatter Equation
desc: If a character's current HP percentage is below 50%, they are considered to have 16 extra stacks of Grit.
enhanced_desc: If a character's current HP percentage is below 50%, they are considered to have 20 extra stacks of Grit. For every 10% further HP lost, gains 2 extra stack(s) of Grit.
